def_cn: 接力比赛(如赛跑或游泳)
def_en: A relay or a relay race is a race between two or more teams, for example teams of runners or swimmers. Each member of the team runs or swims one section of the race.

def_cn: 转播，传送，传输(电视或收音机信号)
def_en: To relay television or radio signals means to send them or broadcast them.

def_cn: (接受和发送电视或广播信号的)转播设备，中继设备
def_en: A relay is a piece of equipment that receives television or radio signals from one place and sends them to another place.
If you relay something that has been said to you, you repeat it to another person.
